TopicTitle: how do you create a hatch on a command pod

Articles.Content:
iv made many attempts trying to make a command pod and a do have some command pods in my mod (Parts O' Plenty). but if  i put a kerbal in them it says "no exit hatch". 

 

 

so how do i put a exit hatch on a command pod using unity and blender, and can you grab on to it when on EVA.

This probably belongs in the modelling and texturing sub-forum. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/15-modelling-and-texturing-discussion/

But Check the links on Adding Airlocks and Ladders in here:
